titles: The declaration of the Right Honorable, Ralph Lord Hopton, Liftenant Generall of all His Majesties forces designed for the west of England. To all His Majesties loving subjects inhabiting in the severall counties of Cornwall, Devonshire, Summerset, Wilts, Bristoll, Bath and Wells, and the counties adjacent. From Plymouth, May. 20. 1650.
author: Hopton, Ralph Hopton, Baron, 1598-1652.
notes: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Great Britain --  History --  Commonwealth and Protectorate, 1649-1660 --  Early works to 1800.
Great Britain --  History --  Civil War, 1642-1649 --  Early works to 1800.
